title: Replace Mumbai location/contact copy with Kekri across frontend and centralize via MARKETING_CONFIG

requirements.summary: Replace all remaining Mumbai/old address/old phone references in UI copy and SEO metadata with Kekri, Rajasthan details.
acceptanceCriteria: No page in the UI displays the words “Mumbai” or the old Mumbai address (“123 Fitness Street, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India”).
About page ‘Visit Us’ section displays: ‘Visit Us in Kekri’ and the Kekri address provided by the user (1st Floor K.J Tower Above B.O.B Bank Ajmer Road Kekri, Kekri, Rajasthan).
Any phone number shown in the UI is consistent with the location update and does not show the old number +91 98765 43210 unless it is the configured number for Kekri.

SEO titles/descriptions on pages that currently reference Mumbai are updated to reference Kekri (preferably using MARKETING_CONFIG.location.displayName/fullLocation rather than hardcoded city strings).

file_operations.description: Remove all hardcoded Mumbai references (SEO title/description, mission copy, and the 'Visit Us' block). Update the 'Visit Us' section headline to 'Visit Us in Kekri' and ensure address/phone render from shared marketing configuration (no old Mumbai address or +91 98765 43210 remains).
Update SEO title/description to remove 'Mumbai' and reference Kekri via MARKETING_CONFIG.location.displayName/fullLocation (import MARKETING_CONFIG as needed).
Update SEO description to remove 'Mumbai' and reference Kekri via MARKETING_CONFIG.location.fullLocation (import MARKETING_CONFIG as needed).
Update SEO description to remove 'Mumbai' and reference Kekri via MARKETING_CONFIG.location.fullLocation (import MARKETING_CONFIG as needed).

requirements.summary: Ensure all address/contact fields and map embed are consistently sourced from MARKETING_CONFIG across the frontend (Footer, Contact page, map, and Visit Us blocks).
acceptanceCriteria: About page ‘Visit Us’ section uses MARKETING_CONFIG fields (address/city/state/country/phone/phoneFormatted) instead of hardcoded Mumbai strings.
Footer contact block continues to render from MARKETING_CONFIG and shows the Kekri address.
Contact page address card and phone link render the Kekri details from MARKETING_CONFIG.
Map iframe uses MARKETING_CONFIG.googleMapsEmbedUrl and the iframe title references Kekri via MARKETING_CONFIG.location.fullLocation.

file_operations.description: Refactor the About page 'Visit Us' section to render address/city/state/country and tel: link from MARKETING_CONFIG (and align the heading text with the config-driven Kekri location).
Confirm the Google Maps iframe src uses MARKETING_CONFIG.googleMapsEmbedUrl and the iframe title references MARKETING_CONFIG.location.fullLocation (update if any hardcoded values exist).
Confirm all displayed contact details and links (address lines, tel:, mailto:) render from MARKETING_CONFIG and remain consistent with the updated Kekri configuration.
Confirm the footer contact block renders fully from MARKETING_CONFIG (address lines and tel: link) and shows Kekri details consistently.

requirements.summary: Update MARKETING_CONFIG to match the provided Kekri location details and ensure the configured phone number is the intended Kekri contact number.
acceptanceCriteria: MARKETING_CONFIG.address/city/state/country reflect the Kekri address provided by the user.
All tel: links and displayed phone formatting across the site match the phone configured in MARKETING_CONFIG.
No remaining components/pages display a different address than MARKETING_CONFIG.

file_operations.description: Set/verify MARKETING_CONFIG fields for Kekri: address '1st Floor K.J Tower Above B.O.B Bank Ajmer Road Kekri', city 'Kekri', state 'Rajasthan', country 'India'; and confirm phone/phoneFormatted/whatsappNumber reflect the intended Kekri contact number (ensuring no legacy Mumbai number is used anywhere).
